channel.title: Job on Learn, Converse, Share
channel.description: Recent content in Job on Learn, Converse, Share

item.title: New Job: GitHub
item.description: I have landed a new gig at GitHub. I will be a Senior Software Engineer on the GitHub OSPO (Open Source Program Office) team. I am super excited to be working with this team and this company.

item.title: New Job: True Link Financial
item.description: Well, it is a new year and I’ve started a new job. I am now a Senior Software Engineer at True Link Financial. After interviewing with the co-founders Kai and Claire and their team, I knew I wanted to work here. TL;DR: True Link: We give elderly and disable (really, anyone) back their financial freedom where they may not usually have it. Longer Version: Imagine you have an elderly family member who may start showing signs of dementia.
